author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel exploring the dangers of totalitarianism.

description: A poignant exploration of racial injustice in the Deep South.

description: A teenager's journey through the complexities of adulthood.

description: A young woman's struggle for independence and love.

description: A tragic tale of love and revenge on the Yorkshire moors.

description: A young orphan's journey to find his place in the world.
